title: HTH Spa 86116 Defoamer, Spa & Hot Tub Chemical Eliminates Foaming, Softens Water, 16 oz

description: The HTH Spa Defoamer is the perfect solution for those who want to relax into worry-free, no-foaming soft water. This easy-to-use product efficiently removes foam from spas and hot tubs, ensuring a soothing experience. The HTH Spa Defoamer is specially formulated with Vitamin E to soften the water and provide an even more relaxing experience. It is compatible with all spas, including those that use bromine, chlorine, and biguanide systems. For best results, use HTH Spa Defoamer as part of your regular HTH Spa care routine. With HTH, you're all clear and ready to enjoy a peaceful soak in your spa or hot tub.
